name: Zobo (Hibiscus)
description: Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants, zobo tea promotes heart health, lowers blood pressure, and supports weight management.

name: Moringa
description: Packed with antioxidants and essential nutrients, moringa tea helps boost immunity, improve digestion, and support healthy skin and hair.

name: Ginger
description: Known for its anti-inflammatory properties, ginger tea aids digestion, relieves nausea, and helps fight colds and infections.

name: Tumeric
description: With its powerful anti-inflammatory and antioxidant effects, turmeric tea supports joint health, boosts immunity, and aids digestion.

name: Scent Leaf
description: Traditionally used for its antibacterial properties, scent leaf tea aids respiratory health, digestion, and helps manage blood sugar levels.

name: Clove
description: Known for its strong antibacterial and pain-relieving properties, clove tea helps with oral health, digestion, and inflammation.
